headline: 3M (MMM) Profit Margin Miss Reinforces Cautious Narratives on Growth and Valuation
summary: 3M (MMM) posted revenue growth forecasts of 2.1% per year, which is well behind the broader US market’s 10% pace. The company’s EPS is projected to grow at 11.8% per year compared to 15.5% for the market. Shares currently trade at $167.23, below some fair value estimates. However, the stock’s price-to-earnings ratio of 26.2x is above the industry average. The gap between revenue and EPS growth, along with compressing profit margins from 15.9% to 13.7%, highlights that investors are still...

headline: Construction Wearable Technology Market Valued at $4.6 Billion in 2025 Led by 3M Company, Trimble, and Magic Leap: Emerging Trends and Growth Projections to 2029 & 2034
summary: The construction wearable technology market is poised for substantial growth due to increasing safety concerns, adoption of IoT, and demand for productivity. Key opportunities lie in AI-powered exoskeletons, smart PPE, real-time health monitoring, and augmented reality. Expansion is driven by innovation and remote monitoring needs.
